item.description:
Join us on October 16th at Middlesex Community College,
Lowell, MA for a day of games and fun- try something new or
reconnect with a favorite. Learn about games you've never even
heard about with our Speed Gaming Event!

Timeline:

11:30-12:00 Registration, check in, coffee, mingling
12:00-1:30: Speed Gaming- Rotate stations to learn about
the RPG and Board Games offered. 5-10 minutes per game,
hopefully you'll meet your dream game!
2:00-6:00 Open Gaming: Each RPG will last between 2-4
hours. There are plenty of board games and gm'less games to
fill the extra time so we hope you'll get to "date" a few
choices!

Role Playing Games
We are still confirming the specific games offered- check BrilliantGameologists.com for updates.
[Want to play something specific or run a game? Contact us
ASAP!]

Board Games
Along with the RPGâ€™s will be a collection of board games
including Dominion, Race for the Galaxy, Zombies!, Settlers of
Catan, Carcassone, Ticket to Ride, Pillars of the Earth,
Agricola, Word on the Street,Say Anything, Apples to Apples and
many more! If you are counting on a specific game on this
list or hope to try one not listed, let us know so we don't
forget it!

Location:
Middlesex Community College Lowell- cafeteria
33 Kearney Square, Lowell
Address/
Directions

Parking:
MCC has a parking garage- the Lower Docks Garage off of Warren
Street with a walkway to the MCC building. There is also on-
street parking, but it is limited.

Registration:
Register by October 10th so we know how many snacks and games
to get and prep! On site registration works too, but we may
have to do some shuffling so we would love if you register
ahead of time!

Admission is free!

If you partake of the snack table, we ask that you contribute
$5 to the snack fund. Our organization has quite a few costs
associated with this event, our podcast, and website, so
additional donations are always appreciated!

Contact and Registration:
To register, confirm here!
Questions? Send an email to gm@brilliantgameologists.com or
twitter us at @bg_podcast

Check the website for updated information: [url=
http://brilliantgameo...[/url]
Go to BrilliantGameologists.com/Mailer and sign up for the
mailing list


Picture:


Location:

Middlesex Community College
33 Kearney Sq
Lowell, MA 0185

Questions to ask:

Are there any board games you want to make sure we bring? The
list is an example only- unless you ask for it, we may not
bring it!
Are there any RPG's (specifically or types) you particularly
want to play? Note- we prefer Indie games and D&D- there won't
be any World of Darkness games unless you run them!
Are you interested in GM'ing a game? What? We'll contact you
if we need more spots."

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: PlayDate: Speed Gaming and one-shot games!
